title: Zack Snyder teases new features of batmobile
text: Zack Snyder teases new features of batmobile Saturday, 24 October 2015 (19 minutes ago) Los Angeles, Oct 24 : "Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice" director Zack Snyder has revealed that the new Batmobile is "purpose-built" and will perform something new in the forthcoming film. The director reveals that the new Batmobile is 'purpose-built' and will perform something new in '*Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice*'.
